name: PixelFoosball
description:
An arcade foosball game. Play with your friends or the CPU (comes with different difficulty levels). Customize your players and choose a time and/or goal limit. Provides controller support.

Controls

Player 1

Move - W/S (up/down in controller)

Dash - Space (A in controller)

Player 2

Move - Up/Down Arrows (up/down in controller)

Dash - Left Shift (A in controller)

Pause - P (Y in controller)

Quit - Esc (Start in controller)
